greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 2 - x - sqrt(1-2x-3x^2).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: D-finite with recurrence: n*a(n) +(-2*n+3)*a(n-1) +3*(-n+3)*a(n-2)=0. - _R. J. Mathar_, Nov 19 2014
mathematica: a[ n_] := SeriesCoefficient[ 2 - x - Sqrt[1 - 2 x - 3 x^2], {x, 0, n}] (* _Michael Somos_, Jan 25 2014 *)
program: (PARI) {a(n) = polcoeff( 2 - x - sqrt(1 - 2*x - 3*x^2 + x * O(x^n)), n)} /* _Michael Somos_, Jan 25 2014 */
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 17 2009
